name: Recco.me
tag_list: facebook, social, recommendations, friends, video, television, tv, show, shows, movie, movies, book, books, music, videos, game, games, video-game, video-games, popular
overview:
Recco.me is a social network that provides recommendations based on common taste between you and your Facebook friends:

• Looking what to watch/listen/read… trust your friends’ choices? • Recco.me gives you recommendations based on common taste between you and your Facebook friends; • Get the most delicious recommendations from your friends and easily find them in iTunes or Amazon.
